record.title: URGING THE PRESIDENT TO DECLARE LUNG CANCER A PUBLIC HEALTH PRIORITY

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the HELP Committee be discharged from further consideration of S. Res. 87, and that the Senate then proceed to its consideration.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
record.narrative: The clerk will report the resolution by title.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating thereto be printed in the Record as if read.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
